attributes.action: Stop cancellation charges for the forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition to stop cancellation charges for the forces.

Why should members of the British Forces, and their families, be penalised for moving when they are told. It is felt that it is grossly unfair that when members of the forces are required to move that they then are subject to the cancellation fees brought by various service providers. We have no choice in the matter and yet we must suffer a penalty normally brought against those that wish to leave their provider under their own volition

rejection.details: The Government cannot prevent companies levying contractual charges. Perhaps you could ask instead that these charges are paid for by the Government, or that an allowance is provided for such cases.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
